description: When I'm summoned, create a random card in hand for each <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link> you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random card in hand for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."
name: Back Alley Barkeep
